rules.name: Order evaluation - Workflow tutorial
rules.description: This is the tutorial workflow. Evaluates final order based on items and user loyalty class and credit.

outputScalarValue.value: Thank you for your order! Your order will be shipped next business day.
outputScalarValue.stringValue: "Thank you for your order! Your order will be shipped next business day."

parameters: "Thank you for your order! Unfortunately, the following item(s) are currently out of stock: "
. We appreciate your understanding and the order will be shipped as soon as the items become available.

outputScalarValue.stringValue: CONCAT("Thank you for your order! Unfortunately, the following item(s) are currently out of stock: ",{items_unavailable},". We appreciate your understanding and the order will be shipped as soon as the items become available.")
